name: TheInspiringTalk
0:
”Alexa, open The Inspiring Talk”
”Alexa, start The Inspiring Talk”
”Alexa, ask The Inspiring Talk”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the inspiring talk
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Inspiring Talk is a weekly podcast show where host Bijay Gautam interviews today’s most successful and Inspiring personalities every week to help you realize your inner potential. These successful people ranges from Authors of best-selling books, Entrepreneurs, celebrities, sport-persons, thought leaders and personalities who has achieved some amazing things in their lives. New episode of this podcast is released every Monday with a very special guest who not only shares with you their success story but also the challenges and obstacles they’ve faced and how did they overcame them to finally achieve what they wanted.
Visit http://theinspiringtalk.com for latest updates and information.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask The Inspiring Talk to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask The Inspiring Talk to start from first episode”
